resources.string: Your Uphold account Dash balance is
Transfer Dash from your Uphold account to this wallet
Fee will be deducted from requested amount.
Your transaction was sent and the amount should appear in your wallet in a few minutes.\n\nTransaction id: %s
You will also need to log out from the Uphold website using your browser
Dash Wallet is no longer linked to your Uphold account. On the next screen press Link Uphold account.
The Uphold service is not available. Please try again later.
Please report this issue to the Dash Wallet support team using "Report Issue" from the main menu.
Your Uphold account isn’t verified yet. Funds cannot be withdrawn.

Your Uphold account has been flagged for review.

Uphold has temporarily restricted your account and you won’t be able to withdraw funds.

Uphold will be in touch to help you sort this out quickly.
Uphold funds are locked for 24 hours.\n\nYou will have sufficient funds for this transfer by %s.
